title: Undergraduate Study in the US Seminar - November
desc: Learn about the admissions process from experts in the field! This seminar offers an in-depth view of the undergraduate admissions process, providing a step-by-step guide to the application process, admissions exams (SAT, SAT Subject Tests and ACT), choosing the right institution, and funding opportunities.  Date: ?Tuesday, 24 November 2015 Time:  4:30 - 7 :00 pm (Registration will open at 4:00 pm. We kindly request you do not arrive earlier due to the lack of a waiting area available prior to the seminar) Cost:  ?10/person* Venue:  University of Notre Dame London Centre, 1 Suffolk Street, London, SW1Y 4HG Each person wishing to attend must register online ahead of the seminar. Registrations cannot be accepted on the day.? ? Testimonial? "My son, husband and I managed to get the front row seats and were totally entranced with the presentations. The format was so clear and the delivery so light and easy to understand I don?t know where the 2 hours went." Eva, parent of prospective US student *If the ?10 registration fee is cost-prohibitive, please contact us at  seminars@fulbright.org.uk  to apply for a fee waiver.
